long_description:
This texture pack was made because some textures simply annoyed me in VoxeLibre and I took it upon myself to improve them.

All textures are based on the original Minecraft texture pack "Pixel Perfection" by XSSheep which is also used in the VoxeLibre game.
name: voxels_reworked
short_description: A texture pack that iterates on the Pixel Perfection texture pack by XSSheep for the VoxeLibre game.
title: Voxels Reworked
